methods.void addSuppressed(Throwable exception): Appends the specified exception to the exceptions that were suppressed in order to deliver this exception.
methods.Throwable fillInStackTrace(): Fills in the execution stack trace.
methods.Throwable getCause(): Returns the cause of this throwable or null if the cause is nonexistent or unknown.
methods.String getLocalizedMessage(): Creates a localized description of this throwable.
methods.String getMessage(): Returns the detail message string of this throwable.
methods.StackTraceElement[] getStackTrace(): Provides programmatic access to the stack trace information printed by printStackTrace().
methods.Throwable[] getSuppressed(): Returns an array containing all of the exceptions that were suppressed, typically by the try-with-resources statement, in order to deliver this exception.
methods.Throwable initCause(Throwable cause): Initializes the cause of this throwable to the specified value.
methods.void printStackTrace(): Prints this throwable and its backtrace to the standard error stream.
methods.void printStackTrace(PrintStream s): Prints this throwable and its backtrace to the specified print stream.
methods.void printStackTrace(PrintWriter s): Prints this throwable and its backtrace to the specified print writer.
methods.void setStackTrace(StackTraceElement[] s: Sets the stack trace elements that will be returned by getStackTrace() and printed by printStackTrace() and related methods.
methods.String toString(): Returns a short description of this throwable.
